house_listing.house_description: Lovely well maintained home. Converted attached garage to fmaily rm plus det gar in back.Enclosed backyard w/privacy fence & inground pool. Beautiful landscaping. Well & pump cnvey w/all pool equip. Pool & appliances all work but convey 'as is'.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Ranch Style, UtilityRoom
